description:
Dash likes to explore new places.  
Let's take Dash on a stroll patrol!

puzzles.description: Make Dash automatically play a silly sound.

hints.description: Drag out the sound state. Choose something for Dash to say. Link the state with an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After the sound, make Dash automatically move forward 50 cm.

hints.description: Drag out the Move To state. Set the distance to 50 cm in the forward direction. Link the state with an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After the sound, make Dash instantly move forward.
puzzles.introduction: Hmmm.  Dash might enjoy the stroll better if the sound and the movement happened at the same time.

hints.description: Tap the Auto cue between the sound and the Move To state. Change the Auto cue to an Instant cue.

puzzles.description: After moving forward, make Dash automatically turn around.
puzzles.introduction:
Great work!  
Now Dash is strolling with sound.  Let's add a twist and turn things around!

hints.description: Drag out the Turn Around state. Link the state with an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After turning around, make Dash automatically play the silly sound again.
puzzles.introduction:
That's a turn for the better!  
Now let's turn this stroll into a patrol!

hints.description: Make a loop! Link the states with an Auto cue.
